answers.answer: I have been overweight with all my pregnancies. I only had problems with my blood pressure in the last 6 weeks. My babies were healthy but smaller. My son was 5lbs 10oz and he was only 2 weeks early. My daughter was 6lbs 14oz and she was 3 weeks early. I am now pregnant with my third and besides a few minor utis and a yeast infection this one has been fine. I think it all depends on the person. Hopefully you wont have any problems. Congrats!!!
Ive been overweight with my pregnancys. Ive had no problems. Like the first post said think it depends on the person. My babies have all been above 8lb as well lol xx am now 10 weeks pregnant. X
Thanks. That makes me feel better. The father asked me if iv would be high risk. I wanted to say go to hell but just had no clue.

Just remember not to go on any sort of diets. Eat normal, but eat healthy. Talk to your doc about anything on your mind or in your concerns, don't be shy. You have a baby to think about. :)Congrats! :)

One of the biggest concerns other than high blood pressure is gestational diabetes.  You will be tested for that in the second trimester.  Also,  some potential risks could be related to more weight gain,  especially in the third trimester.  You will have a lot of complications like back problems,  sciatica possibly.    Even breathing problems by carrying the extra weight.  Like one of the other posters said,  focus on a healthy diet and try to get some light exercising in your schedule (walking).
Yes, and doctors reccomend that if you work out, to do so in water; a pool. It is a lot of less work on your joints
Thanks. I had already started in daily walks, So I'm keeping that in my routine. And I am now making the conscious decision to eat right.

question: I just found out that I am pregnant. I am also very overweight. What effects does my size have on my pregnancy and thr baby? I'm going to call my doctor in the morning for my first apt.
title: What are the hazards if your overweight?
